features.featureTitle: Generate fully new, professional, human-designed-looking portfolio images for each of the 10 existing portfolio projects, producing exactly 12 images per project (120 total), and save them as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the new filenames specified in this build request.

Update `frontend/src/data/projects.ts` so each of the 10 existing project entries keeps its current title/description/category/tools/link unchanged, but replaces its `images` list so it contains exactly 12 image objects (`src`, `alt`) that reference the new generated portfolio image asset paths (absolute `/assets/generated/...`) and include non-empty English alt text for every image.

Ensure the Portfolio UI gallery continues to render multiple images per project without broken/blank image areas by keeping production-safe image loading behavior (normalize image paths and fall back to `getFallbackImagePath()` on error), and update the thumbnail rendering to use a non-cropping fit behavior so thumbnails do not cut off the sides of the portfolio images.
